posts.post_content:
A friend told me that his grandfather was a major league ballplayer. He wanted to know if there were any cards of Byron "Duke" Houck who played with the Philadelphia A's in 1912-14. I researched it and found he was listed in the T222 Fatima. If anyone has one and would be willing to sell it I would be interested. Please let me know. Thanks

Don Miller                       email [url]Rellim@abe.midco.net[/url]

Just in case you get no responses, here is a link to a gallery of the T222 over on Old Carboard. Your man is #17.

[url]http://www.oldcardboard.com/t/t222/t222gal.asp[/url]

Thanks Mike,.... for the information.

Don Miller
He is on several zeenut cards in case this helps
